class.name: NavigationLayersCostMap3D
class.brief_description: Mapping used in path queries to override default costs of navigation layers.
class.description: Mapping used in path queries to override default costs of navigation layers.

method.name: get_navigation_layer_cost
method.description: Returns the custom cost set for navigation [param layer_number].

method.name: set_navigation_layer_cost
method.description: Sets the custom cost for navigation [param layer_number].
